dialogue.utterance: I think mobile food services, like food trucks, provide a unique dining experience. The variety they offer is truly impressive, showcasing local cuisine.
dialogue.annotation: I think <target_01> mobile food services </target_01>, like food trucks, provide a unique dining experience. The <aspect_01> variety </aspect_01> they offer is <opinion_01> truly impressive </opinion_01>, <rationale_01> showcasing local cuisine </rationale_01>.

dialogue.utterance: Sure, but isn't the quality of food often inconsistent? I've had great meals but also some really bad ones from food trucks.
dialogue.annotation: Sure, but isn't the <aspect_02> quality </aspect_02> of food often <opinion_02> inconsistent </opinion_02>? <rationale_02> I've had great meals but also some really bad ones from food trucks </rationale_02>.

dialogue.utterance: I disagree, Jenna. I believe the quality sometimes depends on the truck's reputation and how busy they are. For example, the best food truck in town consistently has eager customers.
